pack.name: AI Conference Circuit
pack.tagline: Pharma & biotech leaders who presented at major AI conferences in 2025
pack.description: Data science, AI/ML, digital, and informatics leaders from pharma and biotech who presented or had significant presence at AWS re:Invent, NVIDIA GTC, Google Cloud Next, Microsoft Build, and Bio-IT World in 2025. These are the decision-makers driving AI adoption in life sciences.
pack.targetBuyer: AI/ML platforms for drug discovery, lab informatics vendors, cloud services, data engineering tools targeting pharma R&D

companies.talkTitle: From Lab to Market: AstraZeneca's Enterprise-Wide AI Success Story
companies.signalDetail: Featured keynote speaker at AWS re:Invent 2025. Showcased enterprise-wide AI deployment across drug discovery, clinical development, and commercial operations. Heavy AWS infrastructure investment.

people.name: James Weatherall
people.title: VP, Head of Enterprise Data Enablement & Chief Data Scientist

people.name: John F. Conway
people.title: Global Head of R&D&C IT, Science and Enabling Units IT

people.name: Mathew Woodwark
people.title: Director, Research Bioinformatics, Data Science and AI

people.name: Nigel Greene
people.title: Director & Head, Predictive Compound Safety & ADME

companies.talkTitle: Novartis's Next-gen Data Platform Enables AI Drug Development
companies.signalDetail: Presented at AWS re:Invent 2025 on next-generation data platform for AI-enabled drug development. Heavy cloud investment for R&D data infrastructure.

people.name: Eli Goldberg
people.title: Data Scientist, Innovative Digital Endpoint Analytics IDEA

people.name: Andreas Steinbacher
people.title: Artificial Intelligence Leader for Lab Automation, R&D Informatics & Machine Learning

companies.talkTitle: Featured in Matt Garman Keynote - AI Innovation
companies.signalDetail: Featured in AWS CEO Matt Garman's keynote as example of AI innovation in healthcare. Major AWS partnership for drug discovery and clinical operations.

people.name: Meghan Raman
people.title: Director, Digital Capability Management, R&D Data Lake and Integration

people.name: William Neil
people.title: Digital Capability Manager, Solution Engineering and Delivery

companies.talkTitle: Featured in AI Keynote + Bio-IT Presentations
companies.signalDetail: Featured in AWS AI keynote and multiple presentations at Bio-IT World 2025. Heavy investment in AI/ML for drug discovery and clinical development. Leading adoption of foundation models.

people.name: Vijay K. Bulusu
people.title: Head, Data & Digital Innovation, PharmSci Worldwide R&D

people.name: Peter Henstock
people.title: Senior Data Scientist Machine Learning & Software Engineering, Statistics & Visualization

people.name: Ronald Goh
people.title: Director of AI & ML in Drug Discovery

companies.talkTitle: Enterprise-Scale AI for Drug Discovery: Strategy, Infrastructure, and Lessons
companies.signalDetail: Major presence at NVIDIA GTC 2025 and Bio-IT World. Showcased enterprise AI strategy for drug discovery. Heavy GPU infrastructure investment. Active in foundation model development.
companies.focus: Enterprise AI, GPU Computing, Foundation Models

people.name: David Herzig
people.title: Senior Scientist, pRED Pharma Research & Early Development

companies.talkTitle: Harnessing LLMs to Accelerate Pipeline Development in Human Omics Hub
companies.signalDetail: Dr. Weiwei Schultz presented on using GPT-4 to accelerate bioinformatics pipeline development. Integration of LLMs with Nextflow for multi-omics analyses.

people.name: Alan Andryc
people.title: Senior Technology Manager, Real World Evidence

companies.talkTitle: AI-Driven Drug Discovery and Applied AI at Scale
companies.signalDetail: Multiple presentations on AI-driven drug discovery and applied AI. Strong partnership with NVIDIA for GPU-accelerated computing. Focus on foundation models and molecular design.

people.name: Lee Clewley
people.title: VP Applied AI (Former GSK, now Tangram Therapeutics)

companies.talkTitle: Scaling AI/ML Infrastructure for Drug Discovery
companies.signalDetail: Presented on scaling AI/ML infrastructure for drug discovery. Focus on cloud-native architectures and high-performance computing for molecular simulations.

companies.talkTitle: AI-Powered Drug Discovery and Development
companies.signalDetail: Multiple presentations on AI applications across drug discovery and development. Focus on target identification, molecular design, and clinical trial optimization.

companies.talkTitle: Cloud-Native Data Platforms for Precision Medicine
companies.signalDetail: Presentations on cloud-native data platforms and precision medicine applications. Strong Google Cloud partnership for AI/ML workloads.

companies.talkTitle: AI Applications in Neurology Drug Development
companies.signalDetail: Presented on AI applications in neurology drug development. Focus on digital biomarkers, patient stratification, and clinical trial optimization.

people.name: Baohong Zhang
people.title: Director, Genome Informatics, Translational Biology & Research

people.name: Eunice Jung
people.title: Associate Director, Medical Evidence & Research & Innovation

companies.talkTitle: Genetic Data Science and AI at Scale
companies.signalDetail: Presented on leveraging genetic data at scale with AI. Regeneron Genetics Center is one of the world's largest sequencing efforts. Focus on target identification and validation.

companies.talkTitle: GPU-Accelerated Drug Discovery and Molecular Simulations
companies.signalDetail: Presented at NVIDIA GTC on GPU-accelerated drug discovery. Heavy investment in AI for small molecule and biologics discovery. Partnership with tech companies for AI infrastructure.

companies.talkTitle: AI-Driven Clinical Trial Design and Optimization
companies.signalDetail: Presented on AI applications in clinical trial design and patient recruitment. Focus on predictive analytics for trial success and site selection optimization.

people.name: Tim Hare
people.title: VP, Head of Data Science (Former Merck)

companies.talkTitle: Translational Informatics and AI in Drug Development
companies.signalDetail: Presented on translational informatics applications. Focus on integrating multi-modal data for drug development decisions. Partnership with AI vendors.

companies.talkTitle: Global Data Engineering and Emerging Technologies
companies.signalDetail: Presented on global data engineering strategy and emerging technologies including AI/ML. Strong cloud partnership for R&D data management.

people.name: Jason Tetrault
people.title: Global Head Data Engineering and Emerging Technologies

people.name: Erik Koenig
people.title: Principal Scientist, Translational Oncology, Head Strategy Innovation Management

companies.talkTitle: Scientific Computing Infrastructure for Drug Discovery
companies.signalDetail: Presented on scientific computing infrastructure supporting AI/ML drug discovery. Focus on cloud-native architectures and high-performance computing.

people.name: Jean-Remy Behaeghel
people.title: Senior Director, Clinical & Quality & Manufacturing Systems, Global IS

companies.talkTitle: Data Science for Rare Disease Drug Development
companies.signalDetail: Presented on data science applications in rare disease drug development. Focus on small patient populations and innovative trial designs.

companies.talkTitle: AI for RNAi Drug Discovery
companies.signalDetail: Presented on AI applications in RNAi drug discovery. Focus on sequence optimization and delivery system design using machine learning.

companies.talkTitle: Computational Approaches for Antisense Drug Design
companies.signalDetail: Presented on computational approaches for antisense oligonucleotide design. AI/ML for target selection and sequence optimization.

companies.talkTitle: AI-Powered Cancer Diagnostics
companies.signalDetail: Presented on AI applications in cancer diagnostics. Focus on multi-cancer early detection and precision medicine using genomic data.

companies.talkTitle: AI-Accelerated Genomics and Foundation Models
companies.signalDetail: Major presence at both Bio-IT World and NVIDIA GTC. Presented on AI-accelerated genomics analysis and foundation models for DNA/RNA. Partnership with NVIDIA for GPU computing.

people.name: Morten Sogaard
people.title: VP & Head Genome Sciences & Technologies, Worldwide R&D

companies.talkTitle: AI-Powered Lab Informatics and Data Management
companies.signalDetail: Presented on AI applications in lab informatics and data management. Focus on workflow automation and data integration across R&D operations.

people.name: Sarah Rudolph
people.title: VP, Head of Data Capabilities, CRG

companies.talkTitle: Digital Manufacturing and AI in Bioprocessing
companies.signalDetail: Presented on AI applications in biomanufacturing and bioprocessing. Focus on process optimization and quality control using machine learning.

companies.talkTitle: Integration of NVIDIA BioNeMo into Lab Informatics
companies.signalDetail: Sapio Sciences announced integration of NVIDIA BioNeMo into Sapio Lab Informatics Platform at GTC 2025. Brings computational drug discovery directly into ELN.

companies.talkTitle: Accelerated Computing and Agentic AI for Drug Discovery
companies.signalDetail: Announced expanded multi-year collaboration with NVIDIA at GTC 2025. Integration of BioNeMo NIM microservices with Orion molecular design platform for drug discovery.

companies.talkTitle: Evo 2: Foundation Models for Biology
companies.signalDetail: Patrick Hsu presented on Evo 2, the largest publicly accessible AI model for biology. Trained on 9.3 trillion nucleotides. Partnership with NVIDIA for model development.

companies.talkTitle: AI-First Drug Discovery at Scale
companies.signalDetail: Presented on AI-first drug discovery platform. One of the largest biological datasets for AI. Strong NVIDIA partnership for GPU computing.

companies.talkTitle: Generative AI for Drug Discovery
companies.signalDetail: Presented on generative AI applications in drug discovery. Partnered with Novartis. First AI-discovered drug in clinical trials.

companies.talkTitle: AI-Designed Drugs: From Discovery to Clinic
companies.signalDetail: Presented on AI-designed drugs in clinical development. Multiple AI-discovered candidates in trials. Partnered with major pharma companies.

companies.talkTitle: AlphaFold3 and Foundation Models for Biology
companies.signalDetail: Major presence at both conferences. AlphaFold3 announced for drug discovery applications. Isomorphic Labs pursuing AI-first drug discovery.

companies.talkTitle: AI-First Approach to Product Innovation
companies.signalDetail: Presented AI-first approach to product innovation at Google Cloud Next 2025. Using AI as core foundation for personalized experiences and automation.

companies.talkTitle: Agentic Workflows & Modern Data Platforms in Healthcare
companies.signalDetail: Presented on AI agents and modern data platforms at Google Cloud Next 2025. Focus on clinical workflow optimization and patient care improvements.

companies.talkTitle: Multimodal Generative AI for Precision Health
companies.signalDetail: Matthew Lungren presented on developing next-gen cancer care with multi-agent orchestration. Healthcare AI Orchestrator for clinical collaboration.

companies.talkTitle: Data Sciences Platform and Foundation Models
companies.signalDetail: Multiple presentations on data sciences platform and foundation models for biology. Key partner for pharma AI initiatives.

people.name: Anthony Philippakis
people.title: Chief Data Officer, Data Sciences & Data Engineering

companies.talkTitle: Cloud-Native Genomics and AI/ML Integration
companies.signalDetail: Presented on cloud-native genomics platform and AI/ML integration. Focus on scalable analysis and collaboration for life sciences.

companies.talkTitle: Enterprise Genomics Data Platform
companies.signalDetail: Presented on enterprise genomics data platform for pharma and healthcare. Focus on multi-modal data integration and AI/ML workloads.

companies.talkTitle: R&D Cloud Platform for Life Sciences
companies.signalDetail: Presented on R&D cloud platform with AI/ML capabilities. Focus on data capture, collaboration, and analytics for drug discovery.

companies.talkTitle: 8 Critical Pillars for Enterprise AI Strategy in Life Sciences
companies.signalDetail: Jesse Cugliotta, Global Lead of Healthcare and Life Sciences, presented keynote on enterprise AI strategy. Focus on data architectures for AI in life sciences.

people.name: Jesse Cugliotta
people.title: Global Lead, Healthcare and Life Sciences

companies.talkTitle: Research Data Management and Automation
companies.signalDetail: Presented on research data management and automation for life sciences. Focus on large-scale data transfer and collaboration.

companies.talkTitle: Scientific Computing Infrastructure for AI/ML
companies.signalDetail: Presented on scientific computing infrastructure supporting AI/ML in life sciences. Consulting expertise for pharma IT transformation.

companies.talkTitle: LLMs and Knowledge Graphs for Drug Repurposing
companies.signalDetail: Presented multiple posters on LLMs, knowledge graphs for drug repurposing, and Nextflow pipelines. New Google Cloud Partner.

companies.talkTitle: FAIR Data and Open Science Platforms
companies.signalDetail: Presented on FAIR data principles and open science platforms for life sciences. Focus on data interoperability and standards.

people.name: Michel Dumontier
people.title: Distinguished Professor, Institute of Data Science

companies.talkTitle: AI-Powered R&D Data Management
companies.signalDetail: Presented on AI-powered R&D data management solutions. Focus on laboratory informatics and data capture.

companies.talkTitle: Enterprise R&D Informatics Platform
companies.signalDetail: Presented on enterprise R&D informatics platform with AI/ML capabilities. Focus on integrated scientific data management.

companies.talkTitle: AI-Driven Molecular Diagnostics
companies.signalDetail: Presented on AI applications in molecular diagnostics. Focus on genomic testing and precision medicine.

companies.talkTitle: Comprehensive Genomic Profiling and AI
companies.signalDetail: Presented on AI applications in comprehensive genomic profiling. Focus on cancer diagnostics and precision oncology.

companies.talkTitle: Scaling Genomic Medicine with AI
companies.signalDetail: Presented on scaling genomic medicine with AI and telehealth. Focus on genetic counseling and clinical implementation.

companies.talkTitle: AI Solutions for Healthcare: Real-World Impact
companies.signalDetail: Presented at Google Cloud Next on AI solutions for healthcare with real-world results. Partnership with HCA Healthcare featured.

companies.talkTitle: Scaling Genomic Testing with AI
companies.signalDetail: Presented on scaling genomic testing operations with AI. Focus on automation and high-throughput analysis.

companies.talkTitle: AI for Genetic Testing and Interpretation
companies.signalDetail: Presented on AI applications in genetic testing and variant interpretation. Focus on scaling genetic analysis.

companies.talkTitle: Scaling Genomic Medicine: Transforming Newborn Screening
companies.signalDetail: Dr. Robert Green delivered keynote on scaling genomic medicine through newborn screening. BabySeq project showcased.

people.name: Robert Green
people.title: Professor of Medicine, Harvard Medical School & Founder

companies.talkTitle: AI for Clinical Trial Design and Real-World Evidence
companies.signalDetail: Presented on AI applications in clinical trial design and real-world evidence. Focus on predictive analytics and site selection.

people.name: Jonathan Morris
people.title: Chief Medical Information Officer & VP, Provider Solutions

companies.talkTitle: AI-Powered Clinical Trial Platform
companies.signalDetail: Presented on AI-powered clinical trial platform. Focus on patient recruitment, site selection, and trial optimization.

companies.talkTitle: Cloud Software for Life Sciences
companies.signalDetail: Presented on cloud software solutions for life sciences R&D. Focus on data management and regulatory compliance.
